title: Chesapeake Bay: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       Use the online map for each trail to see land and water routes and sites around the Chesapeake Bay. The map will give you directions to your destination. For the John Smith trail, click here.  Use the free and official mobile app -- Chesapeake Explorer -- for directions to land and water trails, historic places, and parks and refuges throughout the Chesapeake watershed in Maryland, Virginia, West Virginia, Delaware, Pennsylvania, New York, and the District of Columbia. .
